LJCFileWriter.summary: Contains console and file output methods.
LJCFileWriter.remarks: The FWrite() and FWriteLine() methods that write to the file stream passed to the LJCFileWriter constructor.

FWrite.param: The number of tabs to add to the line beginning.

FWriteLine.summary: Writes a file text line with indents.
FWriteLine.param: The number of tabs to add to the line beginning.
